attributes.action: To restart the Premier league 2020/21 as the Premier league 2019/20 started
attributes.additional_details: To restart the Premier league 2020/21 as the Premier league 2019/20 started.Nil void the Premier league.  We feel out of respect for teams, fans of the teams and biggest respect of the victims of the corana virus that it would be fitting, a sign of respect that the 2019/20 season will be marked down as nil void. That in generations to come people will remember the tragic year of the corana virus and its victims, the year the football stopped.
attributes.background:
Nil void the Premier league 2019/20
Restart in 2020/21 season

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
